name: @tak-nz/media-infra
description: Media infrastructure for TAK-NZ project using AWS CDK

scripts.clean: rm -f bin/*.js bin/*.d.ts lib/*.js lib/*.d.ts lib/constructs/*.js lib/constructs/*.d.ts test/*.js test/*.d.ts; rm -rf cdk.out/*
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && cdk deploy --context environment=dev-test --no-warnings
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && cdk deploy --context environment=prod --no-warnings
scripts.deploy:local:dev: npm run build && cdk deploy --context environment=dev-test --context usePreBuiltImages=false --no-warnings
scripts.deploy:local:prod: npm run build && cdk deploy --context environment=prod --context usePreBuiltImages=false --no-warnings
scripts.synth:dev: npm run build && cdk synth --context environment=dev-test
scripts.synth:prod: npm run build && cdk synth --context environment=prod
scripts.cdk:diff:dev: npm run build && cdk diff --context environment=dev-test
scripts.cdk:diff:prod: npm run build && cdk diff --context environment=prod

author: Christian Elsen <chris@elsen.nz>
